channel.title: Serving For Two - Welcome to our restaurant review blog
channel.description: Serving For Two is a restaurant review blog. We travel the world and check out the local cuisine, then we write about it.

image.title: Serving For Two - Welcome to our restaurant review blog

item.title: Coco-inspired Dinner in Takoteka, Sofia
item.description: Hidden behind the Bilkova bar, the outsides of Takoteka show no signs of what expects you inside. If you’ve enjoyed the Disney movie Coco (2017), then you will definitely like the atmosphere in Takoteka.
item.dc:creator: Nadezhda Yankulska, Dimitar Kalinkov

item.title: A Brunch in KALA, Berlin
item.description: A standard Berlin-type-of-alternative place, with minimalistic design, a sense of authenticity and close attention to sustainability and eco-friendliness.
item.dc:creator: Nadezhda Yankulska
